AT.name: Mega Man™ Zero 4
AT.description: In der vierten und letzten Folge der Mega Man Zero-Serie muss Zero den bösen Dr. Weil davon abhalten, die Macht über Neo Arcadia zu gewinnen und den überlebenden Menschen helfen, ins sichere Area Zero zu entkommen. Mega Man Zero 4 führt den Z Knuckle ein, einen kräftigen neuen Schlag, sowie die Möglichkeit, Teile von besiegten Feinden aufzusammeln, um deine Fähigkeiten zu verbessern. Selbst das Wetter hast du unter Kontrolle, und kannst dadurch Levels leichter oder schwerer machen, indem du die Bedingungen änderst. Mega Man Zero 4 bringt die besten Elemente der Serie für den endgültigen Entscheidungskampf zusammen!

AU.name: Mega Man™ Zero 4
AU.description: In the fourth and final instalment of the Mega Man Zero series, Zero must stop the evil Dr. Weil from taking over Neo Arcadia, and help the surviving humans escape to the safety of Area Zero. Mega Man Zero 4 introduces the Z Knuckle, a powerful new punch, and the ability to mix and match parts from fallen enemies to improve your skills. Even the weather is under your control, as you can make levels easier or harder by changing the conditions. Mega Man Zero 4 brings the best elements of the series together for the ultimate showdown!

BG.name: Mega Man™ Zero 4
BG.description: In the fourth and final instalment of the Mega Man Zero series, Zero must stop the evil Dr. Weil from taking over Neo Arcadia, and help the surviving humans escape to the safety of Area Zero. Mega Man Zero 4 introduces the Z Knuckle, a powerful new punch, and the ability to mix and match parts from fallen enemies to improve your skills. Even the weather is under your control, as you can make levels easier or harder by changing the conditions. Mega Man Zero 4 brings the best elements of the series together for the ultimate showdown!

BE.name: Mega Man™ Zero 4
BE.description: Dans le quatrième et dernier épisode de la série Mega Man Zero, Zero doit empêcher l'infâme Dr. Weil de s'emparer de Neo Arcadia tout en aidant les humains à s’enfuir vers Area Zero. Mega Man Zero 4 introduit le Z Knuckle, un nouveau coup de poing puissant, ainsi que la capacité de ramasser les pièces des ennemis vaincus pour améliorer vos compétences. Même la météo se plie à votre volonté, vous permettant de rendre les niveaux plus ou moins difficiles en changeant les conditions. Megan Man Zero 4 rassemble les meilleurs éléments de la série pour une confrontation finale ultime !

ES.name: Mega Man™ Zero 4
ES.description: En la cuarta y última entrega de la saga Mega Man Zero, Zero debe evitar que el malvado Dr. Weil se apodere de Neo Arcadia y ayudar a que los humanos supervivientes se pongan a salvo en Area Zero. Mega Man Zero 4 introduce el Z Knuckle, un nuevo puñetazo poderoso, y la habilidad de mezclar y utilizar partes de enemigos que hayas derrotado para mejorar tus atributos. Incluso el clima está bajo tu control, ya que puedes aumentar o disminuir la dificultad de los niveles alterando las condiciones. ¡Mega Man Zero 4 combina los mejores elementos de la saga en el enfrentamiento definitivo!

IT.name: Mega Man™ Zero 4
IT.description: Nel quarto e ultimo capitolo della serie Mega Man Zero, il nostro eroe dovrà fermare il malvagio Dr. Weil dal conquistare Neo Arcadia, e aiutare gli umani sopravvissuti a mettersi in salvo nell'Area Zero. Mega Man Zero 4 introduce Z Knuckle, un nuovo pugno potentissimo, e la capacità di abbinare diversi oggetti ottenuti dai nemici sconfitti per migliorare le tue abilità. Potrai persino controllare le condizioni metereologiche per rendere un livello più facile o più impegnativo. Mega Man Zero 4 fonde i migliori elementi della serie per la resa dei conti finale!

Even the weather is under your control, as you can make levels easier or harder by changing the conditions. Mega Man Zero 4 brings the best elements of the series together for the ultimate showdown!

NL.name: Mega Man™ Zero 4
NL.description: In het vierde en laatste deel van de Mega Man Zero serie, moet Zero de kwade Dr. Weil ervan weerhouden Neo Arcadia over te nemen. Bovendien moet hij de overlevenden helpen ontsnappen naar het veilige Area Zero. In Mega Man Zero 4 kun je gebruik maken van de Z knuckle, een krachtige nieuwe stoot en kun je onderdelen van je gesneuvelde vijanden combineren om je vaardigheden te verbeteren. Je kunt zelfs het weer beheersen, zodat je levels makkelijker of moeilijker kunt maken door de omstandigheden aan te passen. Mega Man Zero 4 brengt de beste elementen van de serie samen voor de ultieme krachtmeting!

NZ.name: Mega Man™ Zero 4
NZ.description: In the fourth and final instalment of the Mega Man Zero series, Zero must stop the evil Dr. Weil from taking over Neo Arcadia, and help the surviving humans escape to the safety of Area Zero. Mega Man Zero 4 introduces the Z Knuckle, a powerful new punch, and the ability to mix and match parts from fallen enemies to improve your skills. Even the weather is under your control, as you can make levels easier or harder by changing the conditions. Mega Man Zero 4 brings the best elements of the series together for the ultimate showdown!

PL.name: Mega Man™ Zero 4
PL.description: In the fourth and final instalment of the Mega Man Zero series, Zero must stop the evil Dr. Weil from taking over Neo Arcadia, and help the surviving humans escape to the safety of Area Zero. Mega Man Zero 4 introduces the Z Knuckle, a powerful new punch, and the ability to mix and match parts from fallen enemies to improve your skills. Even the weather is under your control, as you can make levels easier or harder by changing the conditions. Mega Man Zero 4 brings the best elements of the series together for the ultimate showdown!

PT.name: Mega Man™ Zero 4
PT.description: No quarto e último capítulo da série Mega Man Zero, o Zero terá de impedir o malvado Dr. Weil de se apoderar de Neo Arcadia e ajudar os humanos sobreviventes a escapar em segurança para a Area Zero. Mega Man Zero 4 introduz o Z Knuckle, um poderoso novo ataque, e a habilidade de misturar peças de inimigos derrotados para melhorar as tuas capacidades. Podes até controlar o tempo e tornar os níveis mais fáceis ou mais difíceis alterando as condições atmosféricas. O Mega Man Zero 4 junta os melhores elementos da série e apresenta o melhor desafio Mega Man de sempre!

RU.name: Mega Man™ Zero 4
RU.description: В четвертой и последней части серии игр Mega Man Zero, герой Zero должен остановить злого Dr. Weil, который собирается захватить Neo Arcadia, и помочь выжившим достичь безопасности в Area Zero. В Mega Man Zero 4 впервые появляется мощный прием Z Knuckle, а также возможность объединять части побежденных врагов для улучшения способностей героя. Вы даже можете управлять погодой, что позволит вам сделать уровни проще или сложнее. В Mega Man Zero 4 объединены лучшие качества игр серии для решающего противостояния!

SE.name: Mega Man™ Zero 4
SE.description: In the fourth and final instalment of the Mega Man Zero series, Zero must stop the evil Dr. Weil from taking over Neo Arcadia, and help the surviving humans escape to the safety of Area Zero. Mega Man Zero 4 introduces the Z Knuckle, a powerful new punch, and the ability to mix and match parts from fallen enemies to improve your skills.
